string.name: select_passkey_action_title
string.comment: Title of the action to select a passkey. Will appear in the system passkey selector

string.name: select_passkey_action_subtitle
string.comment: Subtitle of the action to select a passkey. Will appear in the system passkey selector

resources.string: 로그아웃했습니다. 앱을 열어 다시 로그인해 주세요.

string.name: passkey_confirm_item_title
string.comment: Title of the dialog for confirming the generation of a passkey for an item

string.name: passkey_confirm_item_body
string.comment: Body of the dialog for confirming the generation of a passkey for an item. The placeholder contains the item title
